title: Exploring Advanced Mathematical Concepts Using Immersive Virtual Reality (IVR)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Requirement to establish a lightweight IVR environment using smartphones. Hybrid operation combining offline workshops with online learning modules

learning_goals: Visually interpret and explain 3D vector spaces and multiple integration concepts in IVR environments
Recreate advanced geometry problem-solving processes (e.g., surface optimization) with over 80% accuracy through immersive simulations
Collaboratively complete and submit differential equation modeling projects with peers on a collaborative IVR platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
